endpoints.description: Submit and update user travel preferences and profiles for personalized recommendations.
Retrieve a list of hotel recommendations based on the user's preferences and destination selection.
Retrieve a list of restaurant suggestions based on the user's preferences and travel itinerary.
Access personalized leisure activity suggestions tailored to the user's interests and destination.
Submit desired destinations and receive a complete travel itinerary.
Adjust and update the existing travel itinerary with new preferences or constraints.
Remove an individual element or the entire itinerary from the user's plan.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific location, including attractions and historical data.
Allow the user to submit feedback regarding recommendations or the overall travel experience provided.
Access previous travel history and recommendations for reference or repeat visits.
